06 Nov 2019, 06:01 by Drafting
Gaby Espino dressed in yellow and revealed that November is her favorite month. â€œReady for My favorite month of the year !! ğŸ’«ğŸ’«ğŸ’« Scorpio Seasonâ€¦ â€, wrote the conductor, who knows that the one who dresses in yellow in her beauty trusts.



And in one last image he also wrote a new and thoughtful message: "Give yourself permission to be sad ... Because if you are brave enough, through your sadness you will begin to hear the wisdom of your heart ...".
